caption.p: Maps of the states of Espirito Santo (ES), Rio de Janeiro (RJ), Bahia (BA), and Minas Gerais (MG) showing the with distribution of YFV infected and non-infected non-human primates that tested positive and negative for YFV infection. The infections were assessed by rtRT-PCR analysis for each municipality every trimester from January to December 2017 and from January to October 2018. The negatives were suspected cases of NHPs found dead in areas where epizootics were occurring, that tested “not detectable” by RT-PCR. Maps were created using QGIS software version 3.0.0 (Girona; https://qgis.org) and Photoshop
